about_the_game:
Victor is sure that he is able to seduce any girl with just a glance, but he faces an almost impossible task. The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within a week he would sleep with five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions. Will the star athletes be able to resist an experienced womanizer?

A spicy adventure turns into a tense detective thriller when a serial killer appears in the city. By a strange coincidence, the maniac chooses victims only from the girls that Victor has seduced.

Will Victor win the bet with the lives of these girls on the line? Will he ever want to stop in his endless chase for lust and connect with one of the girls? Will he be able to protect his chosen one from the insane killer? The answers to these questions depend on the decisions made by, you — the player.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: contains strong language and revealing outfits; sexual innuendo; sex-related language, depictions of sexual acts, as well as depictions of alcohol abuse, or self-harm. The characters discuss sex topics.

About the Game

Victor is sure that he is able to seduce any girl with just a glance, but he faces an almost impossible task. The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within a week he would sleep with five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions. Will the star athletes be able to resist an experienced womanizer?

A spicy adventure turns into a tense detective thriller when a serial killer appears in the city. By a strange coincidence, the maniac chooses victims only from the girls that Victor has seduced.

Will Victor win the bet with the lives of these girls on the line? Will he ever want to stop in his endless chase for lust and connect with one of the girls? Will he be able to protect his chosen one from the insane killer? The answers to these questions depend on the decisions made by, you — the player.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.5GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Womanizer

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650 3.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 970
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX

short_description: The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within a week he would put five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions, into bed. Will Victor win the bet on the lives of the girls?
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, French, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean
